body: Uhh... Who were these two? The tag says Black Lagoon, but there was no boy that looked like him unless... wait is that supposed to be a genderbent version of Fabiola Iglesias? And that means this was the the "artist" version of Roberta. Wow have they ever seen ANYTHING from the anime or manga? If this hadn't been tagged Black Lagoon I would have just thought it was a very generic maid doujin. Just sad.
